title: (x) Demand Response - Century Gothic {Eduardo}
content:
Looks like Futura but not quite. Something's wrong in the letters "RES". Anyone know?   
   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150420193659im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/40763.jpg)
author: andyclymer

comments.content: Am I a bad person if I actually like Century Gothic? I think it has a homely charm that's missing from Avant Garde, and the big x-height that makes it more useful in some situations than Futura.
